fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you do not pick a target, a target will be picked for you.
- You have a 50% chance of swapping roles with your target, and a 50% chance of swapping roles with a random player that isn't your target.
- If you are **controlled** (redirects don't count), you will have a 100% chance of swapping roles with the player you were controlled to.
- Your ability is Astral.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Swap roles with another player before the end of the game. (You cannot win with this role, under any circumstances.)
